description:
The complete version includes [chapter 1 nian xi town past events] ,[chapter 2 immigration missing case], [chapter 3 legal field great escape]. [chapter 4 faceless alliance], [chapter 5 counterattack nian xi town]will be sold by DLC.


"The fall of the flame" is a book about how freedom, emotion, technology and divinity are intertwined in the shadow of an ancient technology empire.

This is yet another stage play in which the characters come and go without distractions, and we as the audience just need to watch it quietly.

It is also a game, of course, how to overcome the strong opponent, need to know yourself, waiting for the opportunity to move, rely on strategy to win the battle.


story background

The great yan empire united the thirteen states of China, and what lurked under the strong rule of the empire was the corruption of bureaucrats, the monopoly of wealth, and the covetousness of foreign enemies.

In the sixty-third year of the new xia dynasty, with the launch of the "the mutiny of the city of flame" by the prince zhaohe, various complicated forces inside and outside the empire stepped onto the historical stage one after another.

Our story starts from the ancient town of nianxi on the edge of the empire...
